verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H2502>Deliver<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>man:<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H4480>man;<s%> <S%H376><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>mischiefs<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H3605>continually<s%> <S%H3117><s%> are they gathered <S%H1481>together<s%> for <S%H4421>war.<s%>

They have <S%H8150>sharpened<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> <S%H5919>adders'<s%> <S%H2534>poison<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Keep <S%H8104><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from the <S%H4480>hands<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from the violent <S%H4480>man;<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H2555><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H2803>purposed<s%> to <S%H1760>overthrow<s%> my <S%H6471>goings.<s%>

The <S%H1343>proud<s%> have <S%H2934>hid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for me, and <S%H2256>cords;<s%> they have <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> by the <S%H3027>wayside;<s%> <S%H4570><s%> they have <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H4170>gins<s%> for me. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H410>God:<s%> <S%H238>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
O <S%H3069>GOD<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5402>battle.<s%>

Grant <S%H5414><s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H3970>desires<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> <S%H6329>further<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> his wicked <S%H2162>device;<s%> lest they <S%H7311>exalt<s%> themselves. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
As for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of those that compass me <S%H4524>about,<s%> let the <S%H5999>mischief<s%> of their own <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> them.

Let burning <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H4131>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them: let them be <S%H5307>cast<s%> into the <S%H784>fire;<s%> into deep <S%H4113>pits,<s%> that they <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H1077>not<s%> up again.

Let <S%H1077>not<s%> an evil <S%H376>speaker<s%> <S%H3956><s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H4073>overthrow<s%> him.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>maintain<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> and the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>poor.<s%>
Surely <S%H389><s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H853><s%> in thy <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
